class polls.models.Question(id, question_text, pub_date)¶

Базовые классы: Model

Параметры:

  • id (BigAutoField) – Primary key: ID

  • question_text (CharField) – Question text

  • pub_date (DateTimeField) – Date published

Reverse relationships:

Параметры:

choice (Reverse ForeignKey from Choice) – All choices of this question (related name of question)

question_text¶

Type: CharField

Question text

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this

pub_date¶

Type: DateTimeField

Date published

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this

was_published_recently()¶
exception DoesNotExist¶

Базовые классы: ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Базовые классы: MultipleObjectsReturned

choice_set¶

Type: Reverse ForeignKey from Choice

All choices of this question (related name of question)

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager

get_next_by_pub_date(*, field=<django.db.models.DateTimeField: pub_date>, is_next=True, **kwargs)¶

Finds next instance based on pub_date. See get_next_by_FOO() for more information.

Finds previous instance based on pub_date. See get_previous_by_FOO() for more information.

class polls.models.Choice(id, question, choice_text, votes)¶

  • choice_text (CharField) – Choice text

  • votes (IntegerField) – Votes

Relationship fields:

Параметры:

question (ForeignKey to Question) – Question (related name: choice)

Type: ForeignKey to Question

Question (related name: choice)

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

class polls.models.Deposit(deposit_id, client_id1, amount, interest_rate, term, opening_date, closing_date, transaction, bank)¶

Базовые классы: Model

Параметры:

  • deposit_id (AutoField) – Primary key: Deposit id

  • amount (FloatField) – Сумма

  • interest_rate (DecimalField) – Процентная ставка

  • term (PositiveIntegerField) – Срок

  • opening_date (DateField) – Дата открытия

  • closing_date (DateField) – Дата закрытия

Relationship fields:

Параметры:

  • client_id1 (ForeignKey to Client) – Client id1 (related name: deposits)

  • transaction (ForeignKey to Transaction) – Transaction (related name: deposits)

  • bank (ForeignKey to Bank) – Bank (related name: deposits)

Reverse relationships:

Параметры:

clients (Reverse ForeignKey from Client) – All clients of this deposit (related name of deposit)

Type: AutoField

Primary key: Deposit id

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this

    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')
